commands.tam.announcement.permission.den: §cYou need OP permissions to use this command
commands.tam.announcement.player.only: §cThis command can only be executed by players
description.tam.announcement_content: One announcement content per line, supports Minecraft color codes (§)
tooltip.tam.announcement_content: Specific content of the announcement, supports multiple lines and color codes
tooltip.tam.background_path: Path to the background image resource
tooltip.tam.button_link: Link address opened after clicking the button
tooltip.tam.confirm_button_text: Text displayed on the confirm button
tooltip.tam.content_color: RGB color value for the announcement content
tooltip.tam.debug_mode: Enable debug mode to show UI boundaries and other auxiliary information
tooltip.tam.icon_path: Path to the icon resource (format: modid:textures/path/to/icon.png)
tooltip.tam.main_title: The main title text of the announcement
tooltip.tam.main_title_color: RGB color value for the main title
tooltip.tam.show_icon: Whether to show icon in the announcement
tooltip.tam.show_on_world_enter: Whether to show announcement when player first enters the world
tooltip.tam.sub_title: The sub title text of the announcement
tooltip.tam.sub_title_color: RGB color value for the sub title
tooltip.tam.submit_button_text: Text displayed on the submit button
tooltip.tam.use_custom_background: Whether to use custom background image
tooltip.tam.use_custom_rgb: Whether to use custom RGB colors instead of default colors
